glsa.title: xv: Buffer overflows in image handling
glsa.synopsis: xv contains multiple exploitable buffer overflows in the image handling code.

background.p: xv is a multi-format image manipulation utility.

description.p: Multiple buffer overflow and integer handling vulnerabilities have been discovered in xv's image processing code. These vulnerabilities have been found in the xvbmp.c, xviris.c, xvpcx.c and xvpm.c source files.

impact.p: An attacker might be able to embed malicious code into an image, which would lead to the execution of arbitrary code under the privileges of the user viewing the image.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All xv users should upgrade to the latest stable version:
